import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create device"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/spaces/{spaceId}/devices"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This will create a device in the system. Measurements need to be sent via the API as well.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"spaceId","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","required":["deviceName","isMainDevice","deviceType","deviceMedium"],"properties":{"deviceName":{"type":"string","x-order":1},"isMainDevice":{"type":"boolean","description":"if device the main device of the space","x-order":2},"deviceType":{"type":"string","enum":["SMART_METER","OPTICAL_METER_SENSOR","WALLBOX","SMART_PLUG","SMART_RELAY","VIRTUAL_LANDLORD_TO_TENANT_METER","ENERGY_METER","NON_SMART_METER","HEAT_PUMP","MICRO_INVERTER"],"x-order":3},"deviceMedium":{"type":"string","enum":["ELECTRICITY","GAS","WATER","HEATING"],"x-order":4}},"title":"NewDevice"},{"type":"object","properties":{"externalDeviceId":{"type":"string","description":"can be used for data transmission"},"meteringLocationId":{"type":"string"},"serialNumber":{"type":"string"},"conversionFactor":{"type":"number","format":"double","default":1},"conversionFactorAlreadyApplied":{"type":"boolean","default":true}}}],"title":"NewExternalDevice"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"the registered device id","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"deviceId":{"type":"string"}},"title":"DeviceId"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
